mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zk_dubbo_service ( interface_name, protocol, version, `group`, application, approval_status, approver, approval_time, approval_comment, provider_count, online_provider_count, gmt_created, gmt_modified ) VALUES
( #{item.interfaceName}, #{item.protocol}, #{item.version}, #{item.group}, #{item.application}, #{item.approvalStatus}, #{item.approver}, #{item.approvalTime}, #{item.approvalComment}, #{item.providerCount}, #{item.onlineProviderCount}, #{item.createdAt}, #{item.updatedAt} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE provider_count = VALUES(provider_count), online_provider_count = VALUES(online_provider_count), gmt_modified = VALUES(gmt_modified)
mapper.update: UPDATE zk_dubbo_service SET interface_name = #{interfaceName}, protocol = #{protocol}, version = #{version}, `group` = #{group}, application = #{application}, approval_status = #{approvalStatus}, approver = #{approver}, approval_time = #{approvalTime}, approval_comment = #{approvalComment}, provider_count = #{providerCount}, online_provider_count = #{onlineProviderCount}, gmt_modified = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE zk_dubbo_service SET provider_count = #{providerCount}, online_provider_count = #{onlineProviderCount}, gmt_modified = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM zk_dubbo_service WHERE interface_name = #{interfaceName} AND (protocol = #{protocol} OR (protocol IS NULL AND #{protocol} IS NULL)) AND (version = #{version} OR (version IS NULL AND #{version} IS NULL)) AND (`group` = #{group} OR (`group` IS NULL AND #{group} IS NULL)) AND (application = #{application} OR (application IS NULL AND #{application} IS NULL))
SELECT FROM zk_dubbo_service WHERE approval_status = #{approvalStatus} ORDER BY gmt_created DESC LIMIT 1000
SELECT FROM zk_dubbo_service WHERE interface_name = #{interfaceName} LIMIT 1

SELECT FROM zk_dubbo_service WHERE interface_name = #{interfaceName} ORDER BY CASE WHEN version IS NULL OR version = '' THEN 0 WHEN version REGEXP '^[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+' THEN -- 解析版本号：major * 1000000 + minor * 1000 + patch CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(version, '.', 1) AS UNSIGNED) * 1000000 + CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(version, '.', 2), '.', -1) AS UNSIGNED) * 1000 + CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(version, '.', -1) AS UNSIGNED) ELSE 1 END DESC, version DESC, gmt_created DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT FROM zk_dubbo_service ORDER BY gmt_created DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
